# Pyloid

> Pyloid is a Python framework for building desktop applications with web technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript).
> It provides an Electron-like experience for Python developers.

## Docs

- [Full Docs](https://pyloid.com/llms-full.txt): Full documentation of Pyloid.

## Quick Start

- [Quick Start](https://pyloid.com/docs/index)
- [LLMs for AI](https://pyloid.com/docs/llm-for-ai)
- [Prequisites](https://pyloid.com/docs/prequisites)

## Core Concepts

- [Thread Safety](https://pyloid.com/docs/core-concepts/thread-safety)

## API Reference - Pyloid

- [BrowserWindow](https://pyloid.com/docs/api/pyloid/browserwindow)
- [Monitor](https://pyloid.com/docs/api/pyloid/monitor)
- [Pyloid](https://pyloid.com/docs/api/pyloid/pyloid)
- [PyloidIPC](https://pyloid.com/docs/api/pyloid/pyloidipc)
- [PyloidRPC](https://pyloid.com/docs/api/pyloid/pyloidrpc)
- [PyloidTimer](https://pyloid.com/docs/api/pyloid/pyloidtimer)
- [Serve](https://pyloid.com/docs/api/pyloid/serve)
- [Store](https://pyloid.com/docs/api/pyloid/store)
- [Trayevent](https://pyloid.com/docs/api/pyloid/trayevent)
- [Utils](https://pyloid.com/docs/api/pyloid/utils)

## API Reference - Pyloid JS

- [BaseAPI](https://pyloid.com/docs/api/pyloid-js/baseAPI)
- [Event](https://pyloid.com/docs/api/pyloid-js/event)
- [Fetch](https://pyloid.com/docs/api/pyloid-js/fetch)
- [IPC](https://pyloid.com/docs/api/pyloid-js/ipc)
- [RPC](https://pyloid.com/docs/api/pyloid-js/rpc)

## API Reference - Pyloid Builder

- [optimize](https://pyloid.com/docs/api/pyloid-builder/optimize)
- [pyinstaller](https://pyloid.com/docs/api/pyloid-builder/pyinstaller)

- [build.py](https://pyloid.com/docs/distribute/build.py)
